message: Site is at www.pycon.tv

yay! Thanks guys! :)
Cool, good job!
@emperorcezar thanks! It also has 2010 ones. Would be happy to embed more videos.

@durden20 just had the site mapped out in my head. I just used Django and clevercss for backend. Frontend jquery, jquery.address helped keeping track of address bar changes. Tried to use jquery.lazy_load but it was not working great, so I rolled out my own.
Has anyone tested the site on iPhone iPad? I'm working on HTML5 video support, jsut wondering if I'll have to edit the site around a bit for mobile devices.
